page.title: 08Our Conservation Project
page.content:
{ A Wild Area One day we thought that we would make a mini nature reserve. So we did. We are trying to encourge animals, bees and birds and butterfiles and we are getting seeds to grow and we are hoping that our seeds will grow. Most of all we want birds to come.
One day we thought that we must plant some flowers for us to smell and some trees for birds to nest in.
We want a wild area for flowers and creatures.We will put some trees in for birds to live in. We want logs for little insects.
{Tuesday 21st May}We saw two wood pidgeons in a tree weaving twigs for a nest and if it lays eggs in the nest then baby birds will hatch.
